snippet: Real estate firms said the average sales price also hit a new high of nearly $2 million, boosted by sales of ultraluxury apartments in new developments.
lead_paragraph: Real estate firms said the average sales price also hit a new high of nearly $2 million, boosted by sales of ultraluxury apartments in new developments.
abstract: Major real estate firms announce plans to release reports showing median price for co-ops and condos in Manhattan hit $1.15 million in 2015, all-time high for borough.

headline.print_headline: Record Year for Manhattan Home Prices, Reports Say
headline.main: Manhattan Apartment Prices Reached $1.15 Million Mark in 2015, Reports Say
